events.message: John Doe submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, expressing strong interest in joining our development team.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as 'software' and 'developer' in the resume.
Recruiter Jane Smith was assigned to manage John Doe's application and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Initial phone screening with John Doe went well; he demonstrated solid understanding of software development fundamentals.
John Doe promptly responded to the interview invitation, confirming his availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled with John Doe for May 10th, aimed to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability.
